about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn more about me
about.description: Code by day, debug by night, dreaming of getaways in between!
about.trying: I'm a passionate programmer who loves technology, particularly .NET, C#, and backend development. I enjoy exploring new technologies, learning different programming languages, and improving my coding skills every day.
about.travel: When I'm not in front of my screen writing code, I enjoy taking trips and going on adventures. For me, both coding and traveling bring a sense of freedom and excitement.
about.slogan: Enjoy the freedom, keep learning forward

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: Check My Resume
resume.summaryText: I love diving into books and discovering new, creative things. I don't have tons of friends, but hey ‚Äî the ones I do have are absolute gems. I can handle most things on my own without needing much help. People say I'm easy to get along with, but at the same time, I'm pretty independent too.
resume.educationText: Learning about information technology at university is a colorful and intriguing trip. In this world, knowledge is more than simply statistics and source code; it is also a voyage of discovering creativity and teamwork. Every discussion, activity, and challenge provides an opportunity to widen my horizons and enhance my connections. University is a journey that entails not only obtaining knowledge, but also growing oneself and connecting with a community of technology aficionados.
resume.jobDescription: Internship focusing on backend development with .NET Core, EF Core, and gRPC. Contributed to building and maintaining internal systems that supported business operations.
achievements: Developed internal APIs for user & transaction modules using ASP.NET Core + EF Core, improving response handling.
Applied Clean Architecture, DDD, CQRS to separate layers and enhance scalability.
Built a validation pipeline with FluentValidation for DTOs, reducing input errors.
Wrote Unit Tests for core services to ensure stability.
Integrated gRPC for inter-service communication, improving performance compared to REST.
openToWorkText: I'm on the lookout for some exciting job opportunities in Can Tho! If you know of anything, I'd love to hear about it. Thank you!
I'm excited to bring my passion for coding and a great sense of humor to your team!
If you're looking to add to your team, I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to send me an email or give me a call. I might be teammate you're searching for!

booking.descriptionText: An online hotel booking website that allows customers to search rooms by date, type, and price; book and cancel reservations; track booking history; and leave hotel reviews. The admin panel supports hotel, branch, room, booking, user, comment, and report management. Built as a monolithic ASP.NET Core MVC project with a 3-layer architecture.
contributionsList: Designed system architecture and database schema with EF Core Code-First.
Built CRUD for hotels, branches, rooms, users, and admins using ASP.NET Core MVC + EF Core.
Implemented booking workflows with secure session handling and role-based authorization.
Applied Repository Pattern, Fluent API, AutoMapper for cleaner data management.
Integrated AdminLTE dashboard with pagination, statistics, and notifications.
booking.moreInfo: See more pictures via my GitHub profile

movie.descriptionText: An online movie streaming website where users can browse by genre, search movies, view details, follow episodes, and comment. The admin panel supports movie, user, and role management with statistics. Built as a monolithic ASP.NET Core MVC project.
contributionsList: Designed relational database with EF Core (many-to-many: film-actor, film-genre).
Developed CRUD for movies and users with ASP.NET Core MVC + EF Core, including search, pagination, and soft delete.
Developed responsive UI with Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
movie.moreInfo: See more screenshots via my GitHub profile
